thread.title: Is Blake Shelton moving on after split with Miranda Lambert?
thread.title_full: Is Blake Shelton moving on after split with Miranda Lambert? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Is Blake Shelton moving on after split with Miranda Lambert?
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct.11 (ANI): Looks like Blake Shelton has moved on after splitting from his wife Miranda Lambert and is readjusting to single life.*
Washington D.C., Oct.11 (ANI): Looks like Blake Shelton has moved on after splitting from his wife Miranda Lambert and is readjusting to single life. The 39-year-old singer's close pal revealed that he was upset during the breakup, however, he is not the type of person who would "sit around and lick his wounds", adding that he has moved forward with his life, People magazine reports. The insider further said that the 'Sangria' hit-maker has "bounced back quickly" from the divorce and that he has experienced the ups and downs in his life but "is doing so well". In addition to this, the 'God Gave Me You' hit-maker's pal mentioned his separation as a "silver lining" for him. "He has the time to take care of himself and he's taken positive steps in his life to spend time with friends and family", added the insider. Shelton and Lambert, who tied the knot on May 14, 2011, announced their divorce back in July. (ANI) Â»
